title: LEGO.Hero.Factory.S03E01.Brain.Attack.720p.WEB-DL.H.264-YFN
description:
LEGO: Hero Factory - Season 3 - Episode 1 (WEB-DL - 720p)
---------------------------------------------------------

In Antropolis City a swarm of giant beasts attack the civilians
to feed them to their underground queen! Now the Heroes must
power up in mighty new battle machines and save the city!

Produced by Threshold Animation Studios and The LEGO Group.


Inside a mysterious lab, an army of evil brains are about to hatch.
Shot out into the galaxy they land in different locations around
Makuhero City. To boost their battle power, the evil brains attack
friendly and innocent beasts turning them into the most powerful
and destructive villains. Ruthlessly they attack the citizens of
Makuhero City and attempt to take over Hero Factory so they can
produce their own breed of super villains. Will the heroes defeat
the villains or will the Brain Attack continue?

LEGO.Hero.Factory.S03E01.Brain.Attack.720p.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-YFN

Format: Matroska Video File (MKV)
Video: MPEG4 Video (H264) 1280x718 23.976fps
Audio: MPEG4 Audio (AAC) 48000Hz stereo
Duration: 00:22:45
File size: 683 MB


"Break Out" aired in 2012 and "Brain Attack" in 2013 but
I'm sharing in the order they were released on DVD/iTunes.
